entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023
